content.title: Natural Selection
content.statement: Natural Selection is a fundamental concept in science biology that provides essential knowledge for understanding related topics.

explanation.intuition: Understanding Natural Selection helps build foundational knowledge in this domain.
explanation.key_insight: The key aspects of Natural Selection include the core principles and their practical applications.
explanation.technical_details: Technical implementation involves applying the core principles of Natural Selection to real-world scenarios.
